name: KigLover
notes:
Very thorough documentation on their site for the ordering process found [on their site](https://kiglover.com/blogs/become-kiger-a-series-of-tutorials-to-help-kiger/become-kiger-how-to-order-a-kigurumi-kigu-mask) as well as a [publicly shared commission process](https://x.com/kiglover_site/status/2001865033999904901). 

 Site additionally has a number of DIY resources and tutorials, as well as a link to their discord.
